head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths ANTIOCO, PAUL W.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths ANTIOCO, PAUL W.

block.p: ANTIOCO-Paul W. Devoted husband of the late Angelina (nee Aliotta). Beloved father of Anne ''Millie'' Madden, Rosalie Arnao, Peter, Esq., Marie Baldizzi and Paul Anthony. Cherished by 13 grandchildren and 13 great grandchildren. Dear brother of Vincent, Stella Iside, the late Fred, Victor, Nancy Damiata, and Julia Palmieri. Mass at St. Paul's 9:30 Monday. In repose Raccuglia & Son, 321-323 Court St, Brooklyn. 718-855-7737
